# customContent

**Instance Property**

An array of custom content objects that deliver accessibility information.

## Declaration

```swift
var customContent: [AccessibilityComponent.CustomContent]
```

## Discussion

Use the Custom Content API to leverage assistive technologies to deliver complex data sets to users in measured portions when they need it.

## Specifying custom data

- **customActions**: An array of custom actions supported by the entity, identified by their localized string key.
